content: dive into tunisian crochet by working this one skein crochet shawl the shawl is a meditative triangle wrap using only basic tunisian stitches easy repeated row and self striping yarn to create interest it s a great confidence booster for beginners and can also be a nice mindful project for more advanced crocheters materials suggested hook 6 mm tunisian hook with 32 cord notions scissors darning needle stitch markers blocking supplies yarn 150 grams of dk weight yarn fingering weight yarn held double can also be used yardage 590 yds of size 3 dk weight yarn suggested yarn mandala by lion brand yarn color pictured wishing well you may substitute with any yarn brand & weight just use recommended hook size and follow pattern the pattern is written in us crochet terms blocking your shawl is recommended
